question_sentence: The world's first affordable vaccine for which deadly disease was rolled out this week?
evidence: Babies in the Ivory Coast and South Sudan were the first to receive the R21 vaccine, which has been approved for children under three. Less than half the cost of the only previous malaria vaccine, R21 vaccines will be rolled out in 13 more African countries by the end of 2024.

question_sentence: The now iconic photo of Donald Trump with his fist in the air after the attempt on his life was taken by which photographer?
evidence: The photo of a defiant Trump moments after a bullet grazed his ear has been hailed as an instantly iconic image, capturing an arresting moment in US history, and one with the potential to influence the election.

question_sentence: England's Euro 2024 dream was ended by a late goal by which Spanish player in Sunday's final?
evidence: The 86th-minute goal sealed Spain's fourth Euros win hours after Carlos Alcaraz's triumph in the Wimbledon men's singles final, marking a standout day in what is proving a golden era for Spanish sport. Find out more on this week's episode of The Week Unwrapped.

question_sentence: Hamas claimed that which top military commander survived an Israeli airstrike on Saturday?
evidence: Hamas stated that an Israeli airstrike failed to kill its intended target, Mohammed Deif. The bombing resulted in the deaths of at least 90 Palestinians, including Deif's lieutenant, Rafa Salama.

question_sentence: Which Labour campaign pledge was not mentioned in the King's Speech setting out the government's plans for this Parliament?
choices: Abolishing hereditary peers in the House of Lords
Lifting VAT exemptions on private school fees
evidence: Keir Starmer said the focus of the agenda laid out in the King's Speech is on providing a "foundation stone" to "rebuild" Britain. Other campaign policies put on the back-burner include imposing a retirement age of 80 on members of the House of Lords.

question_sentence: Adele announced that she plans to do what after her European tour next month?
evidence: The British singer will perform 10 concerts in Europe for the first time since 2016. After that, the artist plans to take a "big break" from music to focus on doing "other creative things just for a little while".

question_sentence: Which "Strictly Come Dancing" professional dancer left the show amid claims he hit and kicked former partner Zara McDermott during training?
evidence: The Italian dancer blamed "passion" and "determination to win" for the events leading up to his dismissal from the show. Video footage of rehearsal sessions allegedly showed him lashing out physically and verbally at McDermott.

question_sentence: Police in which African country have arrested a serial killer who has allegedly confessed to 42 murders?
evidence: Collins Jumaisi Khalusha allegedly confessed to killing dozens of women and dumping their remains at a Nairobi quarry, but sceptics say there are unanswered questions about the investigation.

question_sentence: Medical researchers at King’s College London said patients should be given DIY kits to perform what procedure at home?
evidence: Researchers said as many as one million more women would participate in cervical cancer screenings if the procedure could be done at home using the swab kit, which is similar to a Covid test. Find out more on this week's episode of The Week Unwrapped.

question_sentence: President Joe Biden told an interviewer that he would consider dropping his re-election bid in the event of what?
evidence: The US president tested positive for Covid-19 shortly after telling an interviewer that he would drop his re-election bid if he developed a "medical condition". The White House said he was "experiencing mild symptoms" and would continue his duties while self-isolating at his Delaware home.

question_sentence: Former President Donald Trump announced his running mate this week after surviving an assassination attempt. Who did Trump select as his vice presidential pick?
evidence: Trump named Ohio Sen. JD Vance as his running mate at the Republican National Convention. The pair will hit the campaign trail amid an ongoing investigation into the assassination attempt on the former president.

question_sentence: Elon Musk says he’s moving two of his companies — SpaceX and X (formerly Twitter) — out of California to which state?
evidence: Musk announced plans Tuesday to move his companies to Texas, citing multiple grievances with California laws.

question_sentence: The price of US postage went up again for the second time this year. How much does it now cost for a first-class postage stamp?
evidence: The price of first-class postage is now 73 cents after a 5-cent increase this week. While this may seem inconsequential, it's a big deal to businesses that spend millions each year on bulk mailings, junk mail and periodicals.

question_sentence: Which awards show announced its 2024 nominees this week?
evidence: The nominees for the 76th Emmy Awards – television’s top honor – were announced Wednesday. The beloved FX series ‘The Bear” set a new record in the comedy category with 23 nominations, breaking the record of 22 set by the NBC hit “30 Rock” in 2009.

question_sentence: President Joe Biden tested positive this week for which virus?
evidence: President Biden has tested positive for Covid-19 and is self-isolating in line with CDC guidance.

question_sentence: Which iconic hotel on the Las Vegas Strip closed this week after 34 years in business?
evidence: The Mirage Hotel and Casino on the Las Vegas Strip officially closed on Wednesday. It will reopen in 2027 as Hard Rock Las Vegas, with a soaring hotel tower shaped like a guitar.

question_sentence: Which soccer team won the 2024 Copa América final?
evidence: Argentina won their second consecutive and 16th Copa América title, defeating Colombia 1-0 in Miami. Meanwhile, Spain defeated England at the Euro 2024 final in Berlin.

question_sentence: Which fruit, nicknamed “green gold,” has a history of corruption in Mexico?
evidence: US and Mexican officials are changing the strict processes that direct how avocados can make their way to American kitchens. This comes as the avocado industry remains "deeply intertwined" with corrupt public authorities, researchers at the Global Initiative Against Transnational Organized Crime said in a report.

question_sentence: Which song did NASA transmit into space this week?
evidence: NASA transmitted Missy Elliott’s “The Rain” to Venus for unknown reasons. It took the song nearly 14 minutes to travel to the far planet — a distance of about 158 million miles.

question_sentence: Which celestial event caught the attention of many people on the East Coast this week?
evidence: A fireball streaked across the sky over the New York metropolitan area. NASA said there will be plenty of opportunities to catch more glimpses of meteors this summer!

question_sentence: What precautions are advised by Kent County’s Emergency Management Assistant Director during extreme heat?
choices: Stay cool, stay hydrated and stay informed
Stay in the sun and avoid air-conditioned buildings.
Do not check on at-risk friends, family and neighbors.

question_sentence: What recent discovery has been made in Delaware that is of concern to property owners with boxwoods?
choices: The box tree moth, lethal to boxwoods, has been found in Delaware
A new type of boxwood disease has been identified.
A new boxwood variety has been introduced.

question_sentence: What is unique about Zoe Ziegler’s journey to her role in A24’s ‘Janet Planet’?
choices: She was discovered during a community theater performance.
She had never taken acting lessons or done community theater before landing the role
She attended a prestigious acting school before auditioning for the role

question_sentence: What is the current status of the policy revision in Milford that aims at limiting ‘controversial’ subjects discussed or shown in schools?
choices: The policy is not being considered.

question_sentence: What is the purpose of the recent funding received by the Peoples Settlement Association in Wilmington?
choices: To hire new staff members for the association.
To renovate and modernize the existing community center
To fund a new outreach program in the community.

question_sentence: What are some of the new features at the Delaware State Fair 2024?
choices: Major concert headliners including rapper Ludacris and country star Brantley Gilbert

question_sentence: What is the impact of the Canine Infectious Respiratory Disease Complex outbreak on Delaware animal shelters?
choices: The shelters have seen an increase in the number of stray dogs
The shelters have started a new adoption program in response to the outbreak.
The shelters have not been affected by the outbreak.

question_sentence: What is notable about Jack McGlynn’s selection to the United States men’s 2024 Summer Olympic soccer team?
choices: He is the oldest player on the team.
He is the first member of the Philadelphia Major League Soccer club to be selected for a U.S. Olympic team
He is the only player from Delaware on the team.

question_sentence: What new addition is coming to the DE.CO Food Hall in Wilmington?
According to the article from Southern Living, which two towns were highlighted as ideal spots for a summer getaway?
choices: Boone, North Carolina and Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Florida
Ocean Springs, Missouri and Beaufort, South Carolina
Dripping Springs, Texas and Fairhope, Alabama
